questions.question: How do you create a repeating event?

choices.answer: Create an event but before you save click the repeat box
click on the box you want to create an event and title it.
click on the share button and share it to another user
None of the above

choices.answer: True
False

You click the compose button
Type in the other persons username in the description box

False
